amendment.description: Amendment increases and then decreases the Navy Operations & Maintenance account by $1 million with the intent of entertaining a discussion regarding the importance of providing additional funds from operation and maintenance for the Department of the Navy, Financial Improvement Program (FIP) to accelerate the transformation of financial management processes and internal controls.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 111-233 to increase and then decrease the Navy Operations & Maintenance account by $1 million with the intent of entertaining a discussion regarding the importance of providing additional funds from operation and maintenance for the Department of the Navy, Financial Improvement Program (FIP) to accelerate the transformation of financial management processes and internal controls.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
